
I expect redis-node-client library and socket.io library to be in lib.

I have them symlinked to copies of the library out side of my source tree.

lrwx------  1 khaless  staff    50B  1 Oct 17:48 redis-client.js -> ../../../dep/redis-node-client/lib/redis-client.js
lrwx------  1 khaless  staff    22B  1 Oct 17:53 socket.io -> ../../../dep/socket.io
